task.title: How to Configure Berkeley DB XML Data Source Drivers

prereq.p: For this procedure, you need to already have a Berkeley DB XML database installed on your system.

context.p: supports Berkeley DB XML versions . To configure a data source for a Berkeley DB XML database, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Select Berkeley DBXML from the driver Type drop-down menu.
Click the Add Files button to add the Berkeley DB driver files.
